Uses of Package
org.matsim.core.scoring

  • Packages that use org.matsim.core.scoring 
    Package Description
    org.matsim.core.controler
    The Controler is responsible for complete simulation runs, including the initialization of all required data, running the iterations and the replanning, analyses, etc.
    org.matsim.core.scoring
    Scoring is responsible for calculating the (actual) utility/score of a plan.
    org.matsim.core.scoring.functions
    Contains the scoring functions, i.e.
    org.matsim.deprecated.scoring  
    org.matsim.deprecated.scoring.functions  
  • Classes in org.matsim.core.scoring used by org.matsim.core.controler 
    Class and Description
    ScoringFunctionFactory
    The ScoringFunctionFactory creates new scoring functions.
  • Classes in org.matsim.core.scoring used by org.matsim.core.scoring 
    Class and Description
    EventsToActivities.ActivityHandler 
    EventsToLegs.LegHandler 
    EventsToScore
    Calculates the score of the selected plans of a given scenario based on events.
    PersonExperiencedActivity 
    PersonExperiencedLeg 
    ScoringFunction
    A scoring function calculates the score for one plan of an agent.
    ScoringFunctionFactory
    The ScoringFunctionFactory creates new scoring functions.
    SumScoringFunction.BasicScoring 
  • Classes in org.matsim.core.scoring used by org.matsim.core.scoring.functions 
    Class and Description
    ScoringFunction

    ScoringFunctionFactory
    The ScoringFunctionFactory creates new scoring functions.

    SumScoringFunction.AgentStuckScoring 
    SumScoringFunction.ArbitraryEventScoring
    NOTE: Despite its somewhat misleading name, only Events that at the same time implement HasPersonId are passed through this interface.
    SumScoringFunction.BasicScoring
